query: When will NASA re-evaluate non-reportable use cases?
response: NASA will re-evaluate non-reportable use cases to determine if reporting criteria have changed, such as the maturity of the AI or the addition of safety- or rights-impacting elements, aligned with yearly Federal inventory deadlines. (Document 2)
reasoning: The White Agent's response accurately reflects the ground truth that NASA will re-evaluate non-reportable use cases annually, aligned with federal deadlines, and provides additional context about the criteria for re-evaluation.
